title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, the system makes a beeping sound. Clicking on other buttons also triggers the beeping sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not produce a beeping sound when choosing SWT.MULTI. Clicking on other buttons should not trigger the beeping sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
